title: Any land declared as slum rehabilitation area or on which slum rehabilitation project has been sanctioned, if it is spread on part or parts of C
clause_text: Any land declared as slum rehabilitation area or on which slum rehabilitation project has been sanctioned, if it is spread on part or parts of C.S. Nos. or CTS Nos. or S.Nos.or F.P. Nos. shall be treated as natural amalgamation / subdivision/s of that C.S. or CTS or S.No. or F.P.No. for which no separate approval for amalgamation / subdivision of land would be necessary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
